import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' export const Navbar = () => { cont [menu, serMenu] = useState("shop"); return (

SHOPPER

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}>Men{menu==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("women")}}>Women{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
0
) }
